I volunteer here and have a blast working with the kids and seeing the exhibits myself. A must visit place in Lexington, and oh, did I mention it is free Monday through Friday 8:30 am to 5 pm?

name: American Saddlebred Museum
address: 4083 Iron Works Pkwy, Lexington, KY 40511, USA
reviews: We visited yesterday, I mentioned that I was a teacher and had a student, who was a struggling reader and loved horses, so I pick up free reading material about horses for my classroom. She asked us if we could wait a minute, she returned with a host of various horse reading material and activities as a gift for my classroom! I can’t wait to see the student’s face. Thank you so very much.The museum is a wonderful place to visit and learn about this specific breed of horse. They currently are remodeling to bring even more wonderful educational exhibits and it is included in admission to the Kentucky Horse Park.
I worked on the remodel so there wasn't much to see.
Great place to spend a day or two.  Get close to some beautiful horses and explore the history behind our equestrian heritage.
Cant wait for the remodel to be done! Great place nice staff and lots to do! A very nice place to stop especially if you love horses. Must see place even if your traveling through!
Very nice!

name: Triangle Park
address: 400 W Main St, Lexington, KY 40507, USA
reviews: We went here twice so far this winter to take my daughter and her friend ice skating.  You can skate for hour and a half for $15 and they furnish the skates. You have to park at the parking garage on Main Street and walk about 2 blocks to the park. They have a stand that sales hot chocolate and coffee and other snacks. Its downtown so it's well lighted and so is the parking garage.

The atmosphere is great during the holiday season with the ice skating rink. The ice is a little rough since it is outside and not in a controlled space. If you are going to skate for the first time I would recommend doing the indoor version first.

This park is awesome and well designed fot the community here. It reminded me of home in Chattanooga but they don't have a professional football stadium or baseball team. The Red's do come during off season to play there. So, much to do here, architecture, history, art etc. 
What's not to like
Beautiful place! Love the fountains! ❤️ We went too the tree lighting. They have an ice skating rink, hot cocoa, funnal cakes! Great time!
It use to be a great place to visit. Too many riff raff now

name: Ward Hall
reviews: Such a fun place and great to view when all done up for Christmas.

I am not a big history buff nor an I into architecture, but after driving past this place numerous times, decided to take a tour.  What a fantastic attraction.  Our docent, Ron, was amazing. Full of fun stories and interesting facts.  I was surprised at how many kids were on our tour and they were fascinated by the stories Ron had to tell.  A beautiful property that is just going to get better over time and the renovations continue.  This mansion is massive and stunning.  Words nor pictures cannot do it justice.  I'm looking forward to going back to see the gardens in full bloom and then again at Christmas for the candlelight tour.

Impressive and well worth a road trip. Kentuckys Ward Hall is amazing and they are trying to restore it to what it once was. Tours are by pre determined dates and extremely cheap at only $7 per adult. Highly recommend checking out and listening to the tours guides in depth knowledge of the history of the home and the people that called it home.
Had a great time at the Seed to Feed dinner series. This one was at historic Ward Hall. Had a wonderful evening with great food and atmosphere. The people at our table were a blast!
Great old place.  Good for taking portraits - lovely scenery

name: Bourbon On Main
address: 103 W Main St, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: Great food! First time trying it after reading some other reviews and was wanting something new in Frankfort. We got the burgers and fresh cut fries. So so good! Our server was Ashley, very friendly and gave us great recommendations for the signature cocktails. Had the bourbon side car and it was very very good! Will definitely come back!

Fantastic "hole in the wall" type restaurant. Found this after hitting a few stops on the bourbon trail. Excellent selection of bourbon and beer to go along with American-style food. We had the Spicy Burger, and it was great. Nice atmosphere with very friendly staff. Definitely check it out if you're in the Frankfort area.

This place may seem inconspicuous from the street but make plans to eat here.  Absolutely nailed the burger from bun to beef. Cooked to exact request. 

If you're looking to taste all the local burbons, they have a fantastic selection.

Great food, excellent bourbon selection. Thank you to Kelly for making us feel welcome. An extra shout out for Annie (sp?) for great food and beverage suggestions along with n awesome  smile and being just a genuine person!

It was a great time as well as delicious dinner and spectacular drinks, the service is unmatched anywhere else here in our capital city of Frankfort!!!! The bartender is very friendly and and welcoming......  They would love to have you stop by and check out their take on Capitol cuisine

name: Serafini
address: 243 W Broadway St, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: Valentine's dinner. The food is dope. But I didn't take a picture of the food....I forgot. Basil pesto gnocchi was fantastic. We both had the pear and walnut salad super awesome. Chicken parmesan, Shane said it was fantastic too. Our waiter was really nice.

Serafini is one of my old favorites! I used to work in Frankfort over a decade ago and this used to be on the regular lunch rotation. It is one of the beat Italian restaurants in town in my opinion. Food is always fresh and delicious and this time around it didn't disappoint either. We were short on time and decided to head to Serafini for lunch. Service was great and the ambiance was perfect. The restaurant seemed immaculate too. I had the BBQ burger and my colleagues had the pork chop and the chicken salad sandwich. All the meals were delicious. We will definitely return when we are in town for work! Try it! You won't be disappointed!

Great Italian restaurant with a friendly atmosphere. Carlos is wonderful host and manager. Great people person and has never known a stranger. Very personable and definently will make you feel welcomed.

I stopped for a cocktail at around 2:00 p.m. on a rainy day and wow! The bartender had time and I was treated to a lesson on some really good bourbons and ryes. I didn't eat but if the rest of the staff is any thing like the bartender it's a winner.
Incredible menu with tasty selections! Reasonable prices and excellent service make this a must stop in Frankfort. Food was delicious!

name: Cattleman's Roadhouse
reviews: Incredible steak here hand down. Probably best prime rib I have ever tried. Crust on prime rib so incredible of pepper flavors. So much better than Texas roadhouse.

Our first time at a Cattleman's Roadhouse and had a pleasant trip.  Angela was our server and she demonstrated her skills.  Pleasant to chat with, kept up with the drinks and kept us up to date with the progress of our lunch order.  The salad bar had a nice selection of fresh fruit and veggies.  Restaurant was clean and well maintained.

Excellent steakhouse. All of our meals were prepared perfectly. Our son had the fillet and said it was the best steak he has ever eaten. The salad bar was also very nice and fresh. Definitely recommend.

Stopped in for an early lunch during a cold weekday. Being early, plenty of seating was available. I had a booth in the bar. Service was attentive and food (ordered from the lunch menu) was available fast. Rolls with cinnamon butter were great! The food (country fried steak with mashed potatoes) was exactly what I expected from a roadhouse. Only complaint is several people entered the bar directly from an exterior door, so my seating location was often met with a rush of cold air.

We were immediately seated.. Our server was very friendly. We waited maybe about 15 min on our food which was great in service time and the product was awesome. I honestly have nothing bad to say about our visit.

name: Ginza
reviews: Stayed in the hotel next door while on vacation last summer. Our son ordered take out just about every night for dinner from here. The food was fantastic. My wife and I just didn't want it EVERY night. He did, and LOVED it.

So tasty. The chefs make the Hibachi Grill a super fun experience for the family! Private rooms are perfect for large groups and the waitresses know the menu like the back of their hand. Great service!
It's not bad. Clean, food was prompt. In honesty, the service could have used a little polish. We were rushed through the meal and out the door.
Place is 5 star for Frankfort!!!  Been here twice now and the boat both times, quality is very consistent, nice servers and just can't beat the price... Highly recommend
Amazing food. Fast service and friendly faces. What more could you ask for?

name: Thai Smile
reviews:
Had the take out. Sweet and sour chicken with fried rice.
Absolutely delicious!!!! Generous potion. Service was fast.
Will be back soon. Great place to eat.

Service was outstanding. Food was delicious, well presented, and reminded me of Thai food home cooking. Inside of the restaurant was clean, but a little dated. Menu was good, beer selection was very limited.

Tried to call in an order and get an uber to pickup.  Pat was rude from the get go.  He was extremely impatient as I was asking for pad thai and wanted something else.  I apologized that I was not entirely prepared but had attempted to look at the menu online several times (in fact, even closed and reopened it and it's still just spinning an orange bulb).  I took the uber there to order in person (look at a menu).  He confronted me immediately asking if I was the person who called saying the website with the menu was down, I said yes.  He proceeded to tell me I was wrong and it was up and then pulled out his laptop to prove it to me.  I asked him not to argue with me at this point (I had checked multiple times and it wasn't).  I said I would just like to order.  Of which I then did.  I was given a ticket name "BOSS LADY" see the photo.  No spoon for my soup, no soy sauce had to ask for both.  Got back to my hotel and the soup was so clear, it really needed the soy sauce.  The pad thai, no sauce at all, no shaved carrots, not bean sprouts, not green onion.  Rice noodles, chicken and chopped peanuts.  Won't be going back there again.  Enjoy the attitude and fine cuisine.  Gross

Red chicken curry was great.  Wife had paid thai- very good and a generous portion with lots of chicken.  Service was fast even though it was a busy Saturday night.  Constant stream of takeout customers too.  Can't wait to go back

Please stop being so rude and yelling at your customers. It's not how you run a successful business. It's not their fault that they have not been there before and do not know your menu enough to make a decision within a minute of being there. Give them time to look it over. I have been here twice and had a bad experience both times. I heard the owner several times yelling at customers and making a scene in the restaurant. Yelling for things that is clearly not the customers fault, but in the mind of management, thinks he's always right. I do not want to give my business or money to someone who does that. It is embarrassing for the customer and looks terrible on him. I will not be returning.

name: Buddy's Pizza
address: 212 W Broadway St, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: Great service. We split a 12 inch with sausage peppers and black olives. Plus a Greek Salad and a iced glass with draft beer only 3 bucks for that. We sat in the stepped up window seat for street viewing of the main street. Rustic and steep back in time. Lots of walk ins for the 22 inch take home.

The Frankfort Flop! All in all a great little pizza place to grab a quick slice while downtown or just in the area. The pizza takes a unique spin on NY Style while adding their own originality to it. The crust is flavorful, the cheese is fantastic (although a little greasy which you can expect when using FRESH mozzarella), and the sauce has a great balance to it as well. Check Buddy’s out, your tastebuds will thank you for it!

This is a great pizza shop! It's indie decor and simple layout remind me of a coffee house feel from my college days. Hand written chalkboard menu offers a great variety of food choices. 

A touch of oregano, combined with a unique style of sausage offered a great surprise for your taste buds. The sausage was not your run of the mill store bought meat. This was very tasty without any extra spice.

Be sure to stop in when you can.

This is a hidden gem of Frankfort. There really aren’t enough folks in Frankfort that frequent this place! Their pizza is simply the best! I wish there were free refills and better (any) table service but I willingly sacrifice this for the pizza. Go here and go often and get the big bear. You can thank me later.

Fresh ingredients make for a fantastic dining experience! The pizza was perfection right out of the oven. I also enjoyed the Greek salad. Nice portions. Very laid back atmosphere. Friendly staff. I definitely plan to return.

name: Casa Fiesta
reviews: So I tried this place a few months ago and was not impressed.  But yesterday I gave it another chance.  Glad I did.  We split a grand fajitas.  Way more than just two can eat.  Very delicious. Had a great Mexican food taste.  Surprisingly the food was still very hot when we got drive thru take out.   Will visit again.  Looking forward to when you can reopen the dinning room.

The food here was good and I had a very tasty burrito. The staff were also very friendly. my 5-year-old does not really like Mexican food, so he tried the chicken tenders and french fries. 2 hour surprise, they were some of the best I have ever had. The restaurant also has some very nice decor.
Excellent! Ready quickly. Friendly service. Wonderfully yummy❤️!

Absolutely the best Mexican food in Frankfort hands down. Apparently this building used to be a McDonald's so the booths are very small and not good for taller people! They have a good atmosphere and very friendly and knowledgeable staff!
Outstanding traditional Midwest Mexican food. Everything they serve is fresh and prepared well.

name: LongHorn Steakhouse - Curbside To Go Available
reviews: Come hungry. We were full before the entries even hit the table. Between the appetizers, the bread, and the salad, there is so much food I couldn't believe it. Everything was very tasty also, especially the ribs. The prices were a bit high, but at least we are getting multiple meals out of it. This is definitely a good place for special occasions.

Very good food! Me and my mom have never ate here before, but it was pretty delicious. We had to wait 10 minutes before getting served but then someone served us and they were so nice! The food was fresh and was served fairly quick. Would consider going back one day. 10/10
Really great service, very good food, staged everything perfectly!

My food came out undercooked but they cooked me another plate and have it to me for free. They said it's their policy. I've sent food back before but that's never happened to me. It was a great experience and great service. Thanks guys

Put to go order in at 5:30 for 6:30 pick-up time. It's currently 7:04. Called and their response was, "well we are busy". If this weren't a birthday dinner for a family member I would've already left. After calling several times and waiting (because food was ice cold and one steak was burnt to charcoal) finally talked to Gary Lacy who refunded in full. Very polite gentleman. Turned a terrible experience into a second chance for this location

name: Garcia's Mexican Restaurant
address: 105 Brighton Park Blvd, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: Delicious, fresh food. Love that they serve veggies with most meals instead of the usual refried beans. Ordered for curbside and added two of their strawberry margaritas to go and they were the bomb! Will definitely be back again.

The food is good, a little pricey. I've been here several times and love the shrimp burrito. But I got a chicken and beef enchilada and the meat had absolutely zero flavor.

I'll keep coming back because I know there are good options on the menu, but if I had got the enchiladas on my first visit I might have dropp d this place.

Presentation is nice, friendly atmosphere, nice bathrooms, nice servers!
I was pleasantly surprised how great everything was. I got the chicken and shrimp fajitas it was awesome.

I have been dining at Garcia's occasionally for almost fifteen years and have never had a bad meal. The servers are attentive without being overly helpful. They have a good variety of options on their menu at reasonable prices. The fish and shrimp tacos remain a personal favorite. The salsa is very tasty without being too spicy. I would recommend a visit if you plan to be in the Frankfort area.
Great non-chain Mexican food. I know people that say they have the best salsa in town; Taco Loco is a favorite entree.

name: Gibby's
address: 204 W Broadway St, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: Downtown staple for a long time. Great burger, great atmosphere. Reputation for great service but our experience was just a little off. Not bad, I think they were just a little understaffed. Prices good. Count on a good meal here!

Gibby's is always good! It is my favorite local restaurant. The service is always friendly and attentive. The food is simple and delicious. The prices are reasonable. The atmosphere is Kentucky proud which is appropriate for a restaurant just feet away from the old state capital.
Stopped in for lunch while on a trip to Frankfort. Our meals were great and the prices were decent. Nice choice for a quick meal.
Great place for a sandwich or salads. Huge selection of choices. Friendly staff.  With counter service. A daily special. After four changes to a set down menu restaurant with a happy hour.

We were greeted at the door by a smiling and cheerful waiter who explained that you order at the counter. We tried the steak sandwich, fries, potato skins, steamed vegetables, Cheeseburger, Fettuccine Alfredo, The Reuben sandwich special. Restaurant was clean, bathrooms included friendly staff. If you want one of the fresh salad options late afternoon will leave you wanting so come early.

name: DaVinci's Pizza
reviews: I love a good pizza and DaVinci's Pizza gives exactly that.  It's a small restaurant but I wouldn't call it a hole in the wall because it's actually really nice inside.  It's not that dirty dumpy style pizzeria you would think of out of small places.  It's clean and smells good.  They have a good draft beer selection and the food speaks for itself.  Seriously.  Read that again.  The food speaks for itself.  We tried the Garlic knots and made our own pepper pizza with all the different types of peppers available.  The crust is from a fresh dough, the sauce is perfect and not too acidic.  The cheese is one of few times you'll get a good cheese pull and the flavor of everything together is nothing short of a flavor explosion in your mouth.  I hope they expand soon!

The best pizza I have had in forever.  We tried the Masterpiece.   Perfect description of this pizza.  Everything thing was so fresh.  You have won me over. I have now found my favorite pizza restaurant.  Can't wait until you can open your doors and we can eat in.   I put my email address on the bottom of my receipt, hope to hear from you.

I'll preface this by saying that I visited when we were about a month into the quarantine time, so normal life business might be different. My fiance ordered from here through a delivery service, and he said it was delicious but slow. Thinking it might have been the fault of the delivery service, we decided to try doing a pick up order. We called, ordered, and were told it would be 30 minutes. That was fine by us. We arrived at the store after 30 minutes had passed. The sign on the door said to call and get in line, so we got in line and called to tell them that we had arrived to pick up the pizza we had ordered. The girl on the phone seemed really confused, and after a few minutes said that someone would come out to give us the pizza. We took that to mean get out of the line and wait in front of the door. After another 10 minutes of sitting in front of the store, I went to the door and waved. A server brought a pizza to the door, but when he opened the door, all he had to say was that he was looking for Nancy and that he would have to help me later. I returned to my car, and we waited another 20 minutes while watching the server bring pizza to other cars sitting in front of the store. At this point, we had waited an hour for pizza that was supposed to be ready in 30 minutes, and we had no idea if we were waiting in the right spot or not. We ended up leaving. An hour and a half after we placed the order, I received a text from a number that wasn't the store number saying that our pizza was ready.  Maybe it's just that they haven't figured out their curbside system or that they were unusually busy, but I wouldn't have minded waiting if the store had simply communicated with us about the wait time or where to wait.

DaVinci's is a bit of a splurge for us, but definitely worth it!  It has has quickly became my favorite pizza place by far.  We've gone multiple times and have not been disappointed yet.  Good crust, good sauce, good toppings - just really, really good pizza.

Pleasant local business, decent pizza, comfortable and usually great service.  Specials are up on a chalk board in the corner, so those of us with glasses have trouble seeing.  Owner seems nice and responsive to the community.

name: Miguel's Restaurante - U.S. & Mexico's Best
reviews: The margarita here is probably the worst tasting margarita I've ever had. The bartender never even gave me a menu so I looked it up online. She seemed more interested in talking to guy at the bar while ignoring everyone. The tacos were pretty good with plenty of steak on them, 2 stars because of the tacos.

The first salsa they brought out with the chips had no heat whatsoever, and had sugar in it?  Who does that? I asked for a hotter salsa and it was very good. The guacamole isn't really guacamole... it's just mashed avocado. The steak was very tender and had a great flavor, but the dish itself had too much salt in it. Nice atmosphere, friendly and good service.

called in an order for pickup. Waited over 30 minutes in the parking lot before asking someone about my order. He said if we haven't brought it out, it's not ready. Rude little guy. I left and went elsewhere. Trying support local businesses during the pandemic, but I won't support this place ever again.

Food was good...but service was terrible.  We got a la carte chimichanga ... 2 ea...she charged us a fortune...our bill for 2 was $40.  Instead she could have charged the meals for half the price.  She was rude as well and didn't refill or check on us at all.  We always eat here with our huge family and get treated much better.  I will not eat here again unless with big family.

My first time at this restaurant and I was quite disappointed. The salsa had a bean after taste with little flavor which I don't like. The beans were bland and can tell from a can. The rice had no flavor and was mushy. Food here very bland and over priced. The service was ok but they could be more helpful and friendly. Over all it was ok but I won't be back that's for sure.

name: TT's Tacos & Tortas
reviews: Excellent food! I came here for the first time the other day and I’m back almost immediately! Get the fries in addition to the tacos. You won’t be disappointed!

We didn't know how this experience would end, because we expected something else when we walked in. However, the food was good and well prepared with fresh ingredients.
The atmosphere might not be for everyone, but everything is clean and organized.
Staff was friendly and helped with the choices.
The food here is fantastic. If you’re looking for good food to pickup on the way home from work, look no further than TT’s.

Finally found a decent Mexican style cuisine restaurant since I moved here. Torta's are really good. Their salsas are not playing either really got a kick but are delicious as well. Definitely going back again

I only had a couple of tacos here, but they were pretty darn great. Cheese covered fries are good, too. Some of the other food that I saw I was eating with my eyes. I would love to go back very soon. Very tasty food, indeed.

name: La Fiesta Grande Restaurant
reviews: Had the best tasting Mexican food I've ever tasted here! Look forward to eating here again!
Best food I've had in a long time. It was served hot and fast. Great service.

Great food, friendly people... you can get the small cups of cheese for a dollar I always  get 2 and pour it over everything  steak fajitas,  and chicken chimichangas are my 2 favorite. They give bigger portions than any place in town. It got warm in the place a few times but I'm sure he will have it fixed buy next summer
Excellent food and great service.
Amazing place! Food is awesome and the staff are, too :) The atmosphere is also great! ❤️

name: China Wok
address: 111 Eastwood Shopping Center, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: China Wok has the absolute freshest and best tasting Cantonese cuisine. We’ve eaten there for years and have never gotten a bad meal. The staff is wonderful and remembers what we like to eat and drink. Best food in town!
The food is good but the price is high. This also does not look like egg drop soup.

Traveled all over & China Wok has the best Chinese food and best service anywhere. We always get great delicious fresh cooked food fast and hot. Whenever I'm n town visiting I cannot leave until I've had my tummy filled with China wok

One star only because I had to pick at least one to post. My husband and I eat here frequently. Last night we ordered China Wok rice and egg rolls and it was so salty and greasy...not the way it usually tastes. Tonight we ordered chicken cashew din and sesame chicken. No sesame seeds and completely wrong sauce. It tasted more like Gen Tso. No cashews in the cashew din. Called and talked to owner who offered to remake it if we brought it back to them tonight which we did even though we don't live close. She then said we did have the correct order but that they forgot the sesame seeds and cashews. Did not hold up her offer to remake it nor offer our money back. My husband had to ask for some cashews on the side. We get back home and are not satisfied. Called and talked to her again. She pretty much said my husband was lying about not having sesame seeds and the wrong dish. He just had sesame chicken a few days ago and this was NOT the same dish.  She apologized but still no offer to refund our money or comp a future dinner. This is not how to treat customers esp when they patronize your establishment often. Completely unacceptable and particularly offensive when we give you our business during the current pandemic.  Dinner was trashed, and we will not be going back.

Food arrives hot on an overflowing plate. The taste is mouth watering good, and the staff are very pleasant natured. Also, the establishment was clean and appeared well maintained while I was present.

name: Mai Saigon LLC
reviews: Best Pho in Frankfort. The owner is very nice and the prices are reasonable. It's great that they sell Asian beer as well. Overall, it's definitely a great place and I'll be back.

Very good food so many flavors. The service might not be the best but the quality of food is outstanding.  We ordered 3 more meals to go which we never do that. The special pork with egg rolls was great and added that whole container of fish sauce made it even better.  The chicken curry was so tasty nice stong curry flavor the way it should be. My only negative is that this place is not closer to our house. We would be here every day. Love it
Food is fresh and full of flavor!  Highly recommended 😍

Mai Saigon Vietnamese Restaurant. First thing we noticed was a faint smell of cigarettes or something cooking that smelled like cigarettes. No one in the restaurant was smoking. Over priced for what you receive in my opinion. Bowls or fried rice from 9.50 and 11.50. The fish sauce for the bowls was delicious, with just the right amount of spice. Bowls have noodles, meat, nuts, and lettuce with thin egg rolls. So the bad. In 10 minutes of leaving restaurant I became very sick with with an upset stomach, you can use your imagination, but it was bad. One other that had a bowl became sick. Others were ok, that had fried rice. So I will give a three and assume the food just did not agree with my stomach.

This is a cozy spot for lunch or dinner (or takeout)! I love all their phos - the beef is now my favorite, but whenever I'm not feeling great I love to get their spicy Korean chicken soup. The owners are very friendly and accommodating. One of my two favorite restaurants in Frankfort.

name: Cracker Barrel Old Country Store
reviews: Breakfast, Lunch, or Dinner is always a good meal at Cracker Barrel. Love the comfortable atmosphere, the spacious tables, and the cute items they have for sale in the retail shop.  The staff is friendly and efficient and always keeps your coffee cup filled. Thanks for another great experience!

All the food was fresh, hot and delicious. My 3 kids (ages 10, 8, and 3) were being indecisive and unruly. The staff was very understanding and patient with us. This was by far one of my best experiences at ANY restaurant. Thanks Cracker Barrel!!!

I've been here on several occasions but decided to dine here on Sunday after church. Big mistake. It was super busy and the service was meh.  Didn't get my biscuits or cornbread which was supposed to come with my roast beef meal.  Server just brought the check without asking if we wanted anything else.  Now I understand when it's busy you try to move your diners out so you can seat the next ones but the customers next to us had already finished their meal when we were seated and didn't order anything else, they were just sitting and talking which is fine. Ordered dessert.  Came with the smallest scoop of ice cream on the planet.  Is rather eat at Denny's or Waffle House.
The wife & I both had the Grandma's Breakfast. It was great! Also had the Berry flavored tea. Limited time only.  Loved it.

Cracker Barrel is an oldies but goody. No matter which one you go to, your meal is going to be good. I especially love the roast beef dinner, chicken and dumplings, lima beans, all the breakfast plates, oh in the fall they have those dinners where they wrap beef or chicken in aluminum foil whichever meat you want and add potatoes, carrots and celery and cook on a grill. They are delicious.

name: Pizza Inn Buffet
address: 100 Brighton Park Blvd, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: Pizza Inn was a cozy place with a large buffet of salad fixings , pastas , pizzas and dessert pizzas . The staff was very friendly. They had TV' s to watch and a small game room with more vending machines than games . Overall , it was a good place to eat and enjoy the TV's .
The food was really good, especially the dessert pizza. They have one with brown sugar and cinnamon. It is my favorite.

The pizza all tastes really good, full salad bar, always has 6 or 7 different types of pizzas instead of the 2 or 3 you typically get at some buffets. They are ways pumping out hot pizza so you are never waiting on the pizza you want.  They also have several dessert pizza options....I stop by this place everytime I'm driving through frankfort!
Get atmosphere. Super friendly staff. Good WiFi. Excellent selection.
Very expansive salad bar; beets, broccoli, cucumbers, you name it.   I get veggie pizzas and they taste good.

name: Kentucky Coffeetree Cafe
address: 235 W Broadway St, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: Great atmosphere lovely staff , delicious pastries and coffee. One of the very few places that's open Sunday evening. When we get there the lady was working alone,  she had to take orders, make foods and drinks serve and clean up. It was a big line but she handled it great. Highly recommended
Quaint , skinny , historic building.  Friendly people and a laid back atmosphere. Had live musicians there playing guitars and singing oldies but goodies.  A comfortable place to unwind .

I loved the welcoming atmosphere. The sandwich I ordered was well prepared and reasonable. I loved the closeness of the performers which made us all feel we were being entertained in our own living room. Mary and the staff were so friendly and accommodating. I will definitely return.

One of my favorite places to hang out in Downtown Frankfort. Great coffee and great пива. Weather one one sitting out on the street with friend or huddled with a hot coffee and book, this is the place to be in Frankfort. Today I enjoyed great live music while I had a wonderful dinner and cold drink. Hats off.

It's an amazing place, but the reason I gave a 4 stars rating is because the tables are wabbled. It was hard to study with my friend because of it. Other than that the place is pretty great. Yes service, atmosphere, and snacks are all to be enjoyed

name: Staxx BBQ
reviews: The food was delicious. My order was ready fast and the staff were friendly. Great atmosphere and awesome customer service. I ordered potato salad, green beans, chicken and corn bread I was pleased with everything. The food was hot and the sauce with my chicken was great. I'll definitely be back when I visit Frankfort again.

Named after stax music in
 Memphis Tennessee
Tried the dinner for two pulled pork and brisket which was okay there's better also had pint sized potato salad and pint-size beans  19.

Chicken and brisket were both dry. Mac & cheese tasted more like buttered macaroni with a lot of pepper. Best thing about our meal is that we got 2 cups for drinks when my husband and I were splitting the meal. Save yourself the time and just go to a McDonald’s
Family of 5 adults and one kid ordered the Staxx big meal. You get a lot of food for less than $40. We stopped by on our way east and really enjoyed the food and it was a great value.

Pulled pork and 
Pulled chicken were great the slaw was also good.
The mac n cheese and the green beans needed help. But over all. A great meal. The service was great too. We will be back.

name: Riverboat Grill
reviews: Food done right at very reasonable prices. And the location is excellent! The owners and staff are very friendly and helpful. After we found this place for lunch one day, we went back the very next day for lunch again. It's that good. I would highly recommend it.

Really good food, cheap, nice atmosphere too. I parked behind the library. The ramp down to the dock is really steep and the rails are wobbly. Banana peppers and fried mushrooms are both good pics. They don’t have fountain drinks, the come in cans/bottles.
Good music on the river.. bottle drinks. Was a bit hot .nice scenery of bridge and unusual school building. Walk 20 or so steps

Great food, great atmosphere, friendly and polite staff who checked in constantly. Watching boats on the river was enjoyable and had plenty of seating. First time stopping here during a long road trip and highly recommend.

We had a good evening listening to Phat Mattress and enjoying the food.  The service was good.  The fish and chips and onion rings were good.  We sat along the side of the restaurant and every time someone stepped onto our platform from another platform it rocked us pretty good.  Overall a very good time.

name: Cliffside Diner
address: 175 Old Lawrenceburg Rd, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: Great service! Burger was great. Parking is a little dangerous so be careful. Change the fries to skinny ones and this place would be a 5 star.
I would highly recommend this place for breakfast or lunch! It's hard to find places like this anymore . I will definitely be back 💯

Comfortable, home town feel with some of the sweetest and swiftest staff I've ever seen! Their business has me rethinking the standard of quality I expect- they absolutely knocked it out of the park in terms of the food and the delivery. I left a $10 tip on a $9 meal because they were THAT good!

The food was great, the service fast and friendly, and I love the quaintness of the restaurant. This place is definitely a hidden gem.
If you like a good diner, you needn't look any further.

The staff made my wife and I feel like family! We enjoyed a fantastic meal that was on the table in minutes. At the end of the meal they offered to fill up travel cups.
Do your family a favor and Go Try this place!!!

name: Cook Out
reviews: Food is definitely worth the money spent and great service. Highly recommend going inside to eat.
Their burgers are the best! They actually taste like they came off a backyard grill! Cant beat the price either; you can get 2 big doubles with cheese and everything and an order of fries for

Food tastes like a backyard grill, so that is a plus. Very reasonable prices. I like the ambiance as well. Decor is rustic and nostalgic of Eastern Kentucky. The only thing I will say as a fair warning. They play constant loud religious music throughout. I am not complaining as it does not bother me, but if you are bothered by that, just be aware.

My only complaint is there is rarely a clean place to sit. Even so, the kids and the fam really love eating here. We will be back.
Love love love this place!!! Great food and great prices and the peach cobbler milkshake is amazing
I was so stoked to see this in my way to get other fast food. It wasn't suggested on Google maps when I searched for fast food for some reason. I love cookout, please come to Louisville!

name: Arandas Mexican Restaurant
reviews: I have been a long time customer for years. The last three times I ordered, my order has been wrong. You know how you get a taste for something and then it’s not what you ordered? That feeling that’s how I felt. I gave them a third try because it’s the quarantine and why not help small businesses and I know they are busy. I called and the owner himself answered. I told him what I ordered ($25 worth). I asked for a replacement because the last three times it has been wrong. He told me all I could get was a small cheese dip and that they weren’t perfect. In a matter of 3 weeks I’ve probably spent $75 there. And all I want is my order replaced and he couldn’t even do that? I will NOT go back. Why be loyal to a restaurant that can’t respect the loyal customers?
Best Mexican restaurant in town. Food is always good, and service is Excellent.
It's a regular place for my uncle and to eat at. Their steak burrito is very good. Highly recommend it.
A great use of space.  It's really beautiful inside..  thank you to who ever did the work .
I had heard so much about this Mexican Restaurant that I had to try it. Was not impressed. I will give it one more try, as I always give a place 2 chances.

name: Mi Fiesta
address: 334 St Clair St #1875, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: Can I leave more than five stars? On our passing through this town this was one of the only places open on a holiday but we are glad we stopped in. We all had tacos and they were super on point. What makes this place stand out more than anything else is the customer service. Everyone was so kind and appreciative that we were there. I actually even left my sunglasses there and when I returned they had kept them and I think even cleaned them. They were so friendly there, keep up the good work!

We love going there every time we want Mexican food.  Juan and Robin are our favorite.  They are truly like family.  Ishmael is great.  They always come up to us and say hi and make us feel welcome.  I’m glad to see that they stay busy.  Food is great!  I love the Jamaican Pollo or the fish tacos.
By far the best Mexican food in Frankfort. Delicious food and outstanding service!
Waiter attentive, chicken soup good, chips & salsa average.  Good location and from it, able to see the Christmas Parade floats go by.  Very close to The Grand Theater, which was my next stop.
Great food!! Love this place! Friendly staff

name: Mami Monchitas
reviews:
Love the Chicken Baleadas, even though I can only eat part of one and take the rest home. 
My husband had the Mami Monchitas Family Sampler and loved it. Had to Yale part of his home as well. 
The Mango Margarita’s are amazing!
The menu is outstanding (authentic, as best I can tell).  The food is outstanding. The service is outstanding.  That's all  that needs to be said. Highly recommend this restaurant.
The food was delicious! It was my first visit and our host was very welcoming and shared lots of information about the food. Definitely going back. Margarita was delicious too!!!

Let me start by saying that if you have not been here and you are debating this place among any other, you absolutely have to go here. 

The food is absolutely phenomenal. The service was impeccable. The margaritas were delicious. This place is easy to find, but off the beaten path. I'm willing to bet everything on the menu is delectable.

12/10 must try.
This place is awesome really good food and service. Will be eating there again.

name: Chicken Koup 599 E. Main st Frankfort, Ky 40601
address: 599 E Main St, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: Some damn good chicken, yes that good. Perfectly cooked, good size wings (both traditional and boneless) plenty of flavor from the sauces. Will for sure return for more delicious chicken wings

I had their traditional Buffalo wings and I thought they were going to be breaded but mine weren't and the perfect amount of heat. My husband got the sweet chili and they were way better than Asian zing at Bdubs. Got a sample of the corn nuggets and they were amazing. Excited that Frankfort has a great place for our wings.

Wing only joint; I was hoping they'd have some chicken tenders but they do offer boneless wings!  You can get them tossed in sauce or on the side. We ordered Garlic Parmesan and BBQ.  We got our wings tossed in sauce.  The chicken was juicy, the wings weren't hard, and they had the perfect coating of sauce. Ranch sauce tasted homemade - we'll definitely be back!

And for the germaphobes, inside was clean. The cashier handled money but not the food. The cook wore gloves and she didn't touch cash/her face.
Really good chicken with a nice variety of flavors and styles. Cooked to order, but certainly worth the wait!

I had my first experience with the Chicken Koup today and left very satisfied. Currently, the Chicken Koup is best suited for online, mobile, and drive-thru orders, however I ate inside. There were only two seats at a bar, but that was perfect for my friend and I. We ordered onion rings, corn nuggets, a small order of boneless wings (8 count) and a small order of traditional wings (5 count). The boneless wings were great--no gristle or fatty parts. They were well-sized. The traditional wings are marinated or brined in seasonings for 24 hours, and you could tell. We tried the Koup Sauce (a Mayo based, tomato-like, special sauce), the Teriyaki sauce, the Sweetyaki sauce (a combo of Sweet Chili & Teriyaki), and the hot sauce (which I found most compatible to Louisiana brand hot sauce). All were great. Next time, I think I'll try the lemon pepper rub.

Service was excellent. The two ladies working inside were very helpful with the menu. All of our food was cooked fresh. I noticed their Health Inspection Score posted on the wall was 100. I work in Downtown Frankfort and had no trouble getting in and out on a one hour lunch break. If I were with more than just one other person, I would recommend ordering online and picking up inside or drive thru just to save yourself time. This is a new establishment, and I hope the East Frankfort/KSU community continue to show them some love.

name: Trifecta BBQ
address: 328 St Clair St, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: delicious sauce! very good smoked sausage and pulled chicken! got food very quickly, hot and delicious! thanks!
Good food. Good atmosphere. The folks that run it are super friendly.
Food was good. Very friendly service. "Turkey Ribs" are worth a try. Loved the greens!
Absolutely phenomenal BBQ!  Moist, tender brisket.  Fall off the bone ribs, great sides!  Try the Mac and cheese!  Can't recommend highly enough!
Food was full of flavor, juicy, and well done.

name: Rick's White Light Cajun Diner
reviews: It's been 6 years and I still think of this place often. The best food and attitude. One day I was having so much fun I went for lunch, and hung out until it was time to eat dinner. Great home made bread and the hot sauce will blow you up! Worth a visit!

Super tiny, quaint, authentic diner. The whole place smells fantastic. Food was too top, ate it before I thought to get a picture. Fair warning, the food can be spicy. If you're brave or confident you can handle the heat, you won't be disappointed.

Eclectic decor and vibe and great food! Rick uses food sourced from the USA only and of best quality. Also cooks several delicious Cajun dishes. If you want really tasty food and great atmosphere you should go! Open Tue -Sat 7 to 3
Wow!  Truly an amazing menu.  Don't let the outside appearance fool you, once inside you'll fall in love!  This is a GREAT place to eat.  Highly recommended.
Surprisingly great food in a surprisingly great city... and they sell Little Kings!  White Light Burger & Beignets pictured

name: Sage Garden Cafe
reviews: Adore this little place.  Great lunch place.  Specials are wonderful, friendly staff and it's cute ambiance!  Highly recommend.  Wonderful garden store next door.  I went here all the time with my friend who lived in the area.

This is a very unique place to grab lunch. Really enjoy eating outside & being surrounded by nice plants. However, the past 3 times I’ve come here the service has been very slow & the food is overpriced for what you get. Not gross food but just kinda plain...

Really the only place in Frankfort with healthy, green food options. I wish the Vegan and Vegetarian options were more diverse , but either way the food is awesome!! Please add more Vegan recipes to the menu. Love this place. And bring back breakfast.....
The food was great....service lacked....waiter was great...not enough help....coffee cold
Delicious and fresh food. Nice atmosphere. Parking is not ideal. Somewhat on the pricey side. Overall,  highly recommended.

name: Chili's Grill & Bar
reviews: My daughter and I stopped in for lunch. The restaurant is easy to see and access and there was plenty of parking. Our service was quick and our server was very attentive to our table. Many options on the menu to choose from. My daughter had the cajun pasta with shrimp and I had shrimp tacos. Both dishes were very good. This is a nice place for a quick and casual lunch or dinner.
Shared an appetizer of Chicken & Bacon Quesadillas, Chips & Salsa and Mom had a cup of Loaded Potato Soup. Service was exceptional and food was absolutely delicious.

I’m on the road a lot and use chili’s as my go-to restaurant so I’ve been to many different locations in different states and this one just didn’t meet the bar. When I walked in they didn’t have anyone seating people which happens but someone is always eventually on it, so I stood at the podium and waited for someone to come over but no one ever did. After several minutes of standing there not sure what the deal was and making eye contact with multiple servers who didn’t say anything, I continued to wait and look around while being completely ignored (there was no rush, the building was less than half full, and one waitress was actually sitting at a table hanging out with friends it appeared she was serving). Eventually I walked to the back and caught a server and asked if it was seat yourself even though there was no sign and none of the other chili’s I’ve been to are like that and a waitress answered “yea” without looking at me. Luckily the server I got was a very nice man who earned these two stars on his own but when the food came it just wasn’t good - and it’s a dish I’ve had before and really liked. It was disappointing for a chili’s experience.

Very  poor  service.  If you  was  known  by them than  you  were  great.  We wasn't  and the waitress wouldn't  even  look  are way. Was sitting  with  people  she  new. The bartender  was  so busy  I appreciate  him checking  on  us. We really  should  have  left.  Won't  go back. Food was also  cold.

Chili's offers a menu for most tastes including limited vegetarian. The prices are reasonable and it has daily specials. The wait staff is courteous and attentive. I have found a turnover in staff but perhaps that's indicative of the industry. This restaurant is clean despite being understaffed at times.

name: Two Sisters Cafe
reviews: Capital diner was a nice experience. We will be back. Food was good.
Consistently good food and good service.  Had the chicken salad sandwich.   Chips were still warm from being freshly made.
Name changed to capitol dinner new owners great food and great  friendly service
Really good food at a fair price. Staff is very friendly and helpful if anything on your order isn't correct.  I just wish they were open past 2:00.
Great homemade food and a quick and easy lunch spot! Good deals on the lunch specials for $7.95 comes main dish with 2 sides and cornbread or a roll.

name: Linney's Pizza
address: 717 E Main St, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: Do not get the Alfredo! It was disgusting. The sauce had a bitter aftertaste. Most likely it was processed restaurant sauce in a bag. The chicken was cold cubed cuts like what you find on a salad bar. I was disappointed and dissatisfied. Why is it so hard to find good authentic Alfredo around here?
Got the hot browns  magnificent!

Amazing food and very friendly staff. My fiance had "the best meatball sub" he's ever had. We sometimes have troubles getting our three year old to eat all her food but she ate four slices of pizza here. A toddlers review is the most honest review you can get. Good job, guys.

Great family owned pizza, pasta, awesome ham n cheese. Same people serving and preparing. I live 40 minutes away. Meet my best friend once a month for lunch an to catch up. I have never been disappointed. Pizza, amazing ham n cheese on an a garlic bread hoagie, baked spaghetti..... Always my go to in frankfort, I live 30 miles south
I got their pizza and it was fine. Nothing special. Just basic.

name: Chick-fil-A
address: 1300 US Highway 127 S, Ste F, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: I work at another location in Texas, but stopped by for something to eat while traveling. Staff was beyond friendly, and good came out quick and hot! Definitely one of the better locations I've been to. The only thing I could improve is to put napkins in the bags, but other than that it was very nice.

We love the friendly staff here and the food is always good. we like that the food is always fresh tasting, and the French fries are never too salty.  arson likes to play structure, but doesn't really like the toys that come with the kids meals. I think that last point is the only thing about this place that isn't perfect.
I wen thru drive thru 3 times to get a Cobb salad made the right way. Omg they never mess up in Louisville.

Always enjoy taking my great grand kids to this place. However, on todays visit I saw adults take food into the children's play area. Not a good time.  None of the staff said anything so I am now re thinking that play area... The food is always good. The staff are usually exceptionally nice.

This is the slowest chic fil a I have ever been too. Parking is crazy too. The order helpers in the drive through were very unprofessional and didnt tell anyone which car to follow. Then they both just disappeared. Total about 20 minutes in line.

name: My Guadalajara
reviews: This is our go-to place for Mexican food in Frankfort, mainly due to its proximity to my house. Great top-shelf margaritas!
Outstanding food, waiter Alex was exceptionally polite, very customer friendly.
One of the best places in Frankfort. Great people great food. Best margaritas in Ky.
It doesnt taste like authentic mexican food. Its bland!
Service was VERY slow. My "med rare" steak was  beyond well done. I would have complained IF the waitress had came back to check on us or refill our drinks. Do yourself a favor and keep driving.

name: Fazoli's
reviews: Fazoli's in Frankfort was GREAT. The manager, Stephanie was super nice and took good care of my grandson, friend and myself.   Crew member, Raine was very friendly. It has been 10 years since I ate at Fazoli's. I saw the one while in Frankfort and was super excited to go eat there. Job well done you guys!

Stopped by Fazoli's Saturday evening and it was my first time at a Fazoli's (I'm from Maryland and we don't have them). I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of food. Our waitress was super nice and prompt with everything. A+

My wife and I really enjoy Fazolis but we have one basic issue, regardless of which store or location... 99% of every order has little or NO spaghetti sauce (at all - just plain white spaghetti) from the center all the way to the bottom of each dish, regardless of whether it's Baked Spaghetti Parmesan, reg. Spaghetti  etc.

Who expects to eat plain, white, tasteless spaghetti? Otherwise, love the breadsticks!

Visited from out of town and was very impressed. The food was great and the service couldn’t have been better. Eli took my order and was amazing. He greeted me with a smile, was very polite and eager to help. I was impressed with how hard he worked and continued to ensure I didn’t need anything. Awesome job!!
Great food with fast service

name: Office Pub & Deli
reviews: Wow are the people here extremely friendly. This is 100% a locals establishment where everybody knows everybody. There's af fully stocked bar with counter service. The food is pretty basic but everyone seemed to be there for the all-you-can-eat catfish Wednesday special. I had the beer cheese to go and the Coney Dog with mac and cheese which was nothing special. I definitely return for the friendly staff and customers.
Meatloaf, sandwiches, burgers and plate meals at a good price.  Nice low key and relaxing place to eat.
A great hidden gem in Frankfort. Funny how many people don't know about this awesome lunch spot!
Great service friendly staff!! Great food not over priced!!

Excellent Food, Service, and Atmosphere

I got the fried banana peppers and "2 point" cheeseburger with fries. The food was great, and the waitress (Amy) actually sat down and told me some history about the place. Overall, I had a wonderful experience. Will come again.

name: QDOBA Mexican Eats
address: 1303, 401 US-127 S Suite, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: WOW whoever is the day manager at this location should be retrained in how to speak to his employees and how to actually do the Manager's job. I simply called to get help with a mistake on my order and he wouldn't come to the phone and I could hear his comments to his employee on what needs to be done and believe me it wasn't nicely said. Customer service skills is as important as cleanliness when it comes to having repeat business to a restaurant in my opinion! I do feel bad for his employee's, thank you for reading.....

It took 25 minutes waiting in line before I could even order!  That is not acceptable at all.  Check out the pictures of the empty seating area and long line waiting to order. People are able to eat and leave faster than people can order.  The managers response was "it is a complicated situation" whatever that means. My day is now more complicated because of their painfully slow staff.  The food tasted good but not worth the wait.  I will never "run out quick" to get lunch from this location.
If you're looking for something quick and good this is the right place. Great food, big portions, quick service.
Food is good and staff is friendly but they forgot the soup part of my loaded tortilla soup.

I stood in line over 20 minutes before I could place my order. Two staff members were very non-efficient with no manager supervision. The only excuse given by the guy running the cash register was, "its complicated and something happened earlier that was beyond his control". Hardly anyone sitting in the dining  area eating. Very unacceptable and lame excuse. No apologies given. I will not visit this location again.

name: Captain D's
reviews: The country style fish was delicious. Huge piece of whitefish. Hot and fried perfect. Clean new restaurant.

This was my first time at this location. we had just moved to Frankfort a few months after this restaurant burnt down, and they finally got it rebuilt. I came in for my first time today, and ordered the fish and chicken platter. The staff was friendly, the food was prepared quickly and correctly, the restaurant was clean and neat, although a little bit crowded. It was a great experience and I'll be back.
They also offer discount for military.
They got the order wrong at the drive through. My wife only likes their Chicken and when I got home with the food, both meals were fish dinners. Very disappointing.
Would like it better if the chicken we're dipped in the same batter that is used on their Great fish. Also love the Big Fish Sandwich.
Nice reno to the place. Its actually up to date now and looks more like an upscale hotel!

name: Zaxby's Chicken Fingers & Buffalo Wings
reviews: Best salads. Place so good you wont believe its fast

Can't believe I just spent $7.99+ tax of my hard earned dollars for a 10pc. boneless wings. So small I can fit the hole order, celery, sauce, and wings in the palm of my hand. Always young careless people there on their phones and joking around with each other as half your order sits there a couple of minutes waiting on the other half. Also you ask for a 2nd sauce to go with the 10pc. and they want to demand an extra 0.25 cents. Sad really what the world has come to. Hail the almighty dollar. I feel like they are behind closed doors saying "well we got your money anyesy didn't we". Never again.
Love their salad with cut up chicken, workers are always nice.  Prices are a little high but the food is good and fresh.
Good fresh food, great salads, poor carry-out... called for a small order (8 people)... was told they needed 24 hour noticed... lol... went to Buffalo Wings and they said no problem

Great food with reasonable prices! It's an upper crust fast food joint for sure but you can eat here literally cheaper than Taco Bell.
Friendly staff, clean place, great atmosphere and fast service. Also they have the best salads for price!! Huge and delicious

name: Main Street Diner
address: 227A W Main St, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews:
Breakfast here is a must try in town. Currently, they are only serving breakfast until 10 am on weekdays, but I have hopes they will extend those hours. Everything we tried was amazing. It is wonderful to see the time and dedication the owners have put into their business. They truly care about having quality ingredients, which translates into quality food.

It also helps that Megan is as attentive as she is. She brought out extra gravy for our biscuits. If you don't want any of their breakfast entrees, you can order your breakfast just about any way you'd like it, as they have a sizable a la carte menu. 

If you read this far, what are you waiting for? Go check them out.

First time diner:  Ordered the veggie omelette.  Very good and cooked perfectly. The accompanying hash browns were also very good. Food was served quickly and was piping hot. Pleasant staff. A solid choice for breakfast and I presume lunch and dinner as well. I’ll be back.

Road tripping through Frankfort and found this little gem! Nice location in downtown Frankfort. Cute diner with good diner-type fare. To hear Megan talk about her passion for making food is a real treat! I'd definitely go back if I was in Frankfort again.

My wife and I had dinner on their opening night. Both of us ordered the meat loaf special. We both found it outstanding, as were the onion rings and mini salmon patties we ordered as appetizers. This is the same ownership as the Riverboat Grill a couple blocks away. They are open from 7 am to 9 pm seven days a week.
Excellent service. Great food. Megan did a wonderful job. We will be back the shrimp poboy sounds terrific

name: Arby's
address: 8 Hudson Hollow Road, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: Love Arby's. They always. Have good coupons and the food is good. I usually get the Roast Beef sandwich with red ranch dressing or the French dip which is my favorite. I also like turnovers.

So... Tiffany took my order. She was super awesome. Loved her attitude!!! 
Sandwiches are so goooood. Omgoodness

Very fast service at drive thru! The service worker at the window was attentive and VERY amiable. Got the sauces we asked for.... Not to little, not too many. Just right!
Would've given 5 but, ordered cherry turnover and got Apple 😝. 
I called and made a complaint. Was told the would make it "right'. We shall see......
My absolute favorite fast food restaurant!!! Always the best even if sometimes it takes a cpl minutes to get my order. It's worth it though!
The service at this Arby's location is great. I live close and have never had any problems.

name: Bojangles' Famous Chicken 'n Biscuits
reviews: Polite cashier. Food standard. Beverage center very dirty.

The fast food fried chicken experience I didn't know I was missing. I just wish I hadn't waited until the end of my recent trip to try it! 

Loved their breakfast items as well as their assortment of sauces, sides and the Cajun style option. The staff was very friendly and insisted on making my BoBerry Biscuits in a fresh batch when I told them it was my first time trying them.
Food and beverage was fantastic. Staff very nice and professional. Would recommend this to everyone who is in the area. We were just passing through on the way to a reunion
Friendly service, one of the best biscuits I've ever had. Tenders and potatoes were solid, nothing special. Tea is good. Would go again.

This was my first time eating at Bojangles. I had the bacon, egg, and cheese biscuit combo. Everything was hot, fresh, and tasty. The cashier didn't seem to mind me asking questions about the menu items, and was polite and pleasant. I enjoyed my meal very much, and plan to return for lunch at some point.

name: Arby's
reviews: Good food at this location, place was clean. Seats broken down in a few places. Automatic open and close doors in the restrooms was nice.

This Arby's has yet to disappoint me. I've been here several times, and they've always gotten my order right. The lady at the register even suggested an alternate order that would give me everything I wanted and save me some money.
I tried the fish and cheddar  "2 for $6" and they were pretty good 😋

This Arby's location has become my go-to for a fast lunch.  The staff is professional and the overall work ethic fostered by management is something I didnt expect to ever find in a fast food place anymore.  Often my food is prepared fresh and ready before my credit card  transaction completes!  Only negative is the road hazard bush in front of the store that makes egress a dicey proposition for low-sling car drivers.

Use to be good. Not now. Stael bread. Fries were hard as a rock. What happened. O Frankfort happen
I'll never go back.

name: Beef 'O' Brady's
address: 111 Westridge Drive Suite A, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: Amazing food and LJ was an amazing waiter! I will definitely be back soon. The margarita was delicious and the funnel cake fries were delicious with caramel, raspberry and chocolate sauce.

I eat here fairly regularly. The food is great! The service is excellent. The prices are good oh, and they have some wonderful specials 4 days a week. It is a sports bar / restaurant and when certain teams are playing it gets loud in a positive way.

The food and the people are both wonderful

In town for work so love finding decent places to eat. Extremely satisfied with this place, LJ  was our waiter  he was so nice and on top of everything even the host that seated us was great. Wings were awesome. I will definitely be going back and can't say enough as to how satisfied we were with how friendly and good this place  is.
Typical bar food, but very GOOD bar food.  Lots of TVs showing pretty much anything you'd want to watch.  Excellent,  friendly service.
Chef salad is delicious!

name: Kountry Kitchen
address: 1055 us highway 127 south, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: Wonderful service. Sweet people. My second visit. Best blt I ever had in any restaurant. First visit my food was great too. They know I only get a 30 minute lunch so let me call ahead and have it ready when I walk in. This is going to become my regular place for lunch. Love it.
A good place to dine. GOOD food at good prices and friendly service.
Amazing breakfast.  Pancakes fluffy. Coffee hot. Sugar jug on table! Hashbrowns and breakfast potatoes perfectly crispy.  Gravy on delicious biscuits.  We will be back!
Friendly staff.  Quick seating.  Good food & very good pie!!

If you want fantastic food at a reasonable price, this is the place you want to be. Home cooked food, nothing fancy, but it's fast friendly and delicious. I eat here when ever we are in Kentucky and get my chance. It's better than those chain restaurants.

name: Captain D's
reviews: All right I gave this restaurant a 5-star because of the way the manager on duty handled my problem even though it didn't happen on his shift. I had gotten 2 giant fish sandwiches from here at lunch time and asked for them to be plain and even though the receipt said plain when I got back to the office with my lunch they both had lettuce and tartar sauce on them. I called spoke with the manager on duty at that time, his name was Jared, he told me to bring them back that he would be glad to fix me fresh. When I got to the restaurant Jared wasn't there but the other manager was on duty (I didn't get his name sorry), but he was wonderful in fixing my problem and I will return to this restaurant cause I do love Captain D's fish and the great service!! Thank you for taking time to read this. 😁

The service was good, friendly cashiers. Environment was clean and the interior design was interesting to look at. Food was so delicious and hot, although I wasnt really a fan of the mac and cheese. But other than that, i will definitely be returning.

Captain D's in all my meals there have been very good.  The fish always well prepared.  One time years ago,  we had a couple of pieces not all done.  They apologized. Replaced them.   They were very busy.  Being a former manager of Long John Silver's,  I could appreciate the problem. 
 The restaurant is  clean . People friendly.  
 Glad to see the new one opened on East side of town. Looking forward to trying it out.
Good food for deep fried, fast-food seafood restaurant. Clean and tidy, friendly staff and service was quick.
Food was good

name: Hardee's
reviews: I love Hardee's for breakfast.  Apparently everyone loves Hardee's for breakfast.  The biscuits and gravy are my favorites.  They also have eggs and sausage, bacon,  coffee and soft drinks.   I like to eat at Hardee's every chance I get.  I have lunch there also. Their food is good and affordable.

The flavor of our breakfast sandwiches was good enough and the staff was very friendly. That's where the good ended. The floors were super sticky and hard to walk on, to the point of sounding and feeling like pulling velcro apart. The food looked absolutely nothing like the pictures. The bread on our Frisco breakfast sandwich was touching, as though there was basically nothing on the sandwich. This is the most disappointing, because they have a huge picture advertising it on the menu board. To top things off, the outside of the wrappers were extremely greasy, defeating the purpose of something to keep your hands at all clean. 
Disappointing to say the least.
Very good service, had a roastbeef sandwich, juice and very tasty. A Great sandwich. Will Go Back.

They have the best hamburgers of any fast food chain. Great food, great service.  A couple of times they were very slow due to lack of employees and we got our food free. I argued with the manager and wanted to pay but he insisted. Clean most of the time.

Bryann made us feel more than welcome from the second we came in the door. One of the best Hardee's restaurants we have been to I completely give Bryann that win though he went above and beyond for customer service to me and my wife just passing through never seen him before in our lives but treated like family elders !!!! Great food especially good service and clean establishment.

name: G. Gerrad's Jazz Restaurant & Lounge
address: 76 C Michael Davenport Blvd, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: The food was delicious and friendly hospitality bit the reason why I give it a 3 star is because the silverware was dirty and i think my cloth napkin had a lil bit of mold spots in the corner of the napkin (forgot to get a pic of that). Luckily i didnt have to use the silerware that was dirty. But other than thatx everything was great!!
The grand opening offered a buffet style lunch that gave us all a snippet of what's to come. The food was delicious.
G. Gerrad’s is committed to rebuilding communities and strengthening families one bite at a time. Great hospitality and AMAZING southern comfort food with a twist.
Great. Loved it
Very nice venue

name: Willie's Tiki Bar
address: 651 Benson Valley Rd, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews:
Nice quiet Marina atmosphere.
 can beer including Blue Moon and others. Simple food where the locals eat after Boating

I'm treated like family here. Sometimes that's a good thing, sometimes not! 🤣 A very laid back atmosphere. Being on or near water always makes me feel better. Plus Doug serves great food in the summertime. Try the veggie sandwich. I came up with that recipe and Doug perfected the technique of grilling it. Hope you love it!

Absolutely fabulous! The quintessential double burger topped with an onion ring and beer cheese. An exercise in gastronomic extravagance. I will certainly be back before cold weather shuts them down for the season.
Nice environment
A nice burger joint located at the Benson Marina. A good place for lunch or happy hour. Their karaoke is very popular in the summer months.

name: Terrace
reviews: No service at all, sat for over ten min and never saw one person .  phone rang over ten times while were waiting and no one even bothered to come pick it up

The bartender did not come take our order, he just stared at us while he went an took orders from the older crowd. We was about to leave an go back to our room when one of the other employee came an took care of us. She apologized an said she thought he got us when we came in. We were there for awhile waiting but her being friendly an the great tasting food made up for it.
Great food!!! Great atmosphere..will definitely go there again on my next trip to Capital Plaza Hotel!!
Omg the Cheesecake is to die for. Very nice place.

name: Penn Station East Coast Subs
address: 1303 Lawrenceburg Road, US-127, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: Good food. The bog guy taking your order with the beard is pretty rude. Happened more than once. Went in 2 different times for lunch that week.  It was cold in the place also. The seats made your buttocks cold
I love it
It was delicious, but expensive! My first time eating here, I was impressed with the quality of the food and service. However, $11+ for a sub and fries? Wow.
The GM and employee are so nice and pleasant, food is so delicious. store is cleaned Bathroom are spotless. Will come here often and recommend to friends and family
Fast friendly service, yummy food.

name: Parlay's Tavern
reviews: The folks that own this place are really good folks and a really good bunch of a down-home good people hang out there. Recommended if you'd like to relax and enjoy some good company
A great place to relax and enjoy good friends and awesome music.
Very nice local bar. Excellent friendly staff.
Loving it but I miss my buddy joe!
Was an amazing place to just hang after work. Great people running the place

name: Panera Bread
address: 101 Westridge Drive Suite D, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: Yum! They never disappoint.  The new double bread bowl is AMAZING and more than enough to share. The staff was friendly and quick with our order.
I never have a bad experience at this Panera location! Super clean, fantastic service, and nothing beats parking it with my food and a book next to the fireplace. ❤
Great large location to get work done. Not very crowded and ample parking. Nice crowd of regulars, felt very at home there.
It was very good service, however they forgot a sandwich in our bag. Went back in and retreived the sandwich and got a free cookie. Very good service and apologies.

Great place and love the food. Today i asked the make the sandwich warmed up but it was still served cold in-spite of asking multiple times. Also, they are out of that ginger drink figured it out after buying the same. Otherwise its best place in Frankfort.

name: East Side Diner
reviews: I absolutely love this place good food wonderful service lovely atmosphere and the best hamburgers in town.

name: Subway
address: 238 W Main St, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews:
The worker was polite and courteous. 

 The food was average. The place was clean. No complaints.
Great place to stop and grab a quick snack
Great food fast and friendly 😊
One of the better subways I've had the opportunity to eat at. Clean store and friendly staff.
The nicest people ever! Always the best service and great food!

name: Tienda La Chiquita
reviews: They need learn English if living here. And stop acting like american walks in store that they want to steal.

I ordered my food to go, started to eat my tamale and found a staple in it.
My wife called the store slash restaurant and told them and they hung up the phone.
Food was mediocre and will never go back again.
Very very disappointing and furious for the lack of concern.     Eat with caution!!!!!!

I placed an order for 4 meals.  3 of them were wrong and one of them had a staple in it.  I understand the language barrier and getting orders wrong, but staples in the food?  How on earth can that even happen ??   So I called the store to let them know what happened and she didn't understand me, mumbled a few word and hung up on me.  Again...language barrier ...but hang up on the customer??? I wasnt even speaking in an angry voice..  I was very nice and simply informing them.  For $48, that's not right.
More than five times I had eaten here even yesterday, so far the food is excellent with reasonable price, and people are so kindly and friendly...
Excellent food, made fresh, and a warm family atmosphere.

name: Koi Express Frankfort Ky
address: 101 Jett Boulevard Suite 500, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: Not sure what other reviewers experienced, but today our lunch was a total bumber!! Got our steak and teriyaki chicken platters, opened them up and reminded us of school lunch, skimpy and bland with no flavor. Almost all rice for $23. Never again!
Great service and food at competitive prices without sacrificing quality!
FOOD IS SOO GOOOD!
Delicious food
Highly recommended. Prepared very fast and was surprised me!! Great job for all staffs, all meals very tasty, love it 😍!! Koi express at Frankfort  👍👍👌

name: Tammy's Diner LLC
reviews: Great place to eat! Best chili and chocolate pie around. Staff are friendly and down to earth. If you want home style cooking and atmosphere, come here! The breakfast is also spot on.
Awesome Home Cooking..Very helpful staff. I bought a plate of food to go home after eating meatloaf dinner.  See Y'all next time I'm in town.. Thank you 😊
Great mom and pop restaurant friendly staff and patrons wonderful and fast service the kind of place you see  a lot of regular customers

My wife and I were staying nearby in a RV park and decided to go out to breakfast.   We had platter 1 and 2.  The eggs were cooked perfectly to our order(over medium), the sausage was ok and the toast was good.  My fried potatoes were very salty which is my only complaint.
The service was excellent and the prices were very fair.
I came here with my papaw a lot before moving to Utah. The food is great. It’s closest place you can get home cooking food in Frankfort Kentucky. The staff is like family to you. Highly recommend.

name: Goodwood Brewing Frankfort
address: 109 W Main St, Frankfort, KY 40601, USA
reviews: Wonderful Wonderful WONDERFUL service, AmAzInG food, Delicious beer!! What more can you ask for?! "Courtney" a.k.a. April is a phenomenal server with great recommendations!! Our food was slap ya mama good! Fish and chips, mac and cheese, the chicken, buffalo cauliflower...my my my!!! Jerry, shout out, you are beyond wonderful!!! Could have sat with you for hours! Thanks for taking such thorough great care of my hubby and I!!

I was in the area checking out a couple distilleries, didn’t see this location on the map and happened to found it as we were walking by. The burger was really juicy and good! I had the Beer Cheese and Bacon Burger with a side of Tatertots. I had an Bourbon Barrel Stout which was amazing as well.

Our server was polite and attentive (trystin?) Our food came hot fresh and quick. Prices are very reasonable for the portions. Only complaint would be extra parking...not extremely difficult to find but could use a sign or something.

Great spot downtown on the river! Looking forward to coming back when it's warm out to sit on the deck overlooking the river. Space was welcoming with plenty of seating. Food was fantastic and the beer was great! Our server was amazing. We had a large group with kids and he did a great job. We will definitely be coming back!

💥Fabulous view of the Kentucky River with delicious reasonably priced above average bar food. Park your car 🚗 anywhere in downtown Frankfort and walk to all the tourist points of interest including this Fabulous tavern!
😊Nicki, our server was friendly, informative and very attentive. 👏
